servinfosub.title: Symptom Description
servinfosub.ptxt: TCM does not shift to 5th gear under any of the following condition.

item.ptxt: 4L/N switch is turned ON. (4L or N mode)
Engine coolant temperature is lower than 50 °C (122 °F).
A/T fluid temperature is lower than 15 ± 3 °C (59 ± 5.4 °F).
When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out with 2 persons, a driver and tester, on a level road.

action.ptxt: Go to A/T System Check:5 A/T .
Perform DTC flow to repair and retry.

test1.ptxt: Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
Check ECT monitored by TCM using scan tool.

action.ptxt: Faulty ECT sensor, its circuit or engine cooling system. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

testgroup.title: A/T fluid temperature check

test1.ptxt: Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
Check A/T fluid temperature using scan tool.

testgroup.question: Is A/T fluid temperature more than 30 °C (86 °F)?

action.ptxt: Faulty A/T fluid temperature sensor or transmission. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch ON, check voltage between terminal “E93-9” of TCM connector and ground under the following conditions.

spec.title: “4” position switch specification
spec.ptxt: Shift selector lever to “P”, “N” or “D” range: 2.9 – 3.8 V
Shift selector lever to “R”, “4”, “3” or “L” range: 1.4 – 2.0 V

action.ptxt: Faulty “4” position switch or its circuit. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch ON, check voltage between terminal “E93-4” of TCM connector and ground.

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Faulty 4L/N switch or its circuit. If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
